 Analytics Constructor.

Variable Documentation

W Analytics

Initial value:

 function(acct_no, isPending, mode){
    
    this.version = '0.0.1';
    this.name = 'Analytics';
    
    _uacct = acct_no?acct_no:'UA-103181-8';
    
    _userv = mode?mode:1;
    
    this.start = function(){
        urchinTracker();
    };

    
    if(!isPending) this.start();
}
Analytics Constructor.

Parameters:
acct_no Google Analytics profile ID (e.g. 'UA-103181-8')
isPending (optional) true for pending tracking. otherwise, auto-start tracking
mode service mode (0=local, 1=remote, 2=both)
Examples:
Analytics.html, and CodeExample.html.
